channel.title: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i418.photobucket.com/albums/pp268/mousekittenbear/Minecraft%20Tutorial/tutorialskellyfire.gif[/img][/center]
which is why he hasn't left the house since his second birthday the closest he has ever been to outside is when he thought he saw somebody spamming the forums in real life (years of solitary confinement by his parents has tainted his view on the world) and so he nearly jumped out of the window to attack them like any loyal moderator would, but then burnt [because hes shit]

item.title: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

<Speljohan_> also his name is rager squad
<Speljohan_> cos he gets so mad

Honestly, there are plenty of people here that don’t like me, but you’re the only one immature enough to keep causing trouble

Read full topic
item.source: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside

item.title: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Did you really just come back so you could post this?

You’re a douche bag lol.

I would lock this if I weren’t on my phone…

Read full topic

item.title: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:5, topic:430948”]I have a problem with arseholes, I have made it clear that if somebody treats me badly then I’ll treat them badly back, and david goes out of his way to try and wrongfully punish me[/quote]Why are you here then? If people are ass holes to you, they have a reason most likely. This isn’t the only forum in the world.

Read full topic

item.title: The reason davidi2 doesn't go outside
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I have sent him many private messages asking him if we can call a truce and become friends, he just ignores it and continues to publicly disrespect me, I see no reason why I should stop when he (the moderator) is meant to be the mature one

Read full topic
